already knew this was coming. but i have NEVER played an elder scrolls game. should i??

> 
> already knew this was coming. but i have NEVER played an elder scrolls game. should i??

Yes, you freaking should, Mainly Morrowind, Oblivion, and Skyrim.

But this game is just turning into WoW with better graphics.

Yell at Zenimax Online Studios (or something). They are the ones making the game. The Elder scrolls online isn\'t a TES game in my opinion. TES is a singleplayer game, this is a multiplayer game. Can\'t wait for the next TES though.

Also, Morrowind is the best of the three mentioned, but it has a steep learning curve, then followed by skyrim, and then oblivion.

In some ways I found Oblivion better than Skyrim.

I wish you could wield a staff (non magic) that could block and attack but also have the ability to cast a spell... :\'(
Man, they really screwed this one up.

From the official site:

> 
> Â© 2012 ZeniMax Media Inc. The Elder ScrollsÂ® Online developed by ZeniMax Online Studios LLC, a ZeniMax Media company. All Rights Reserved.

I don\'t see Bethesda name there... ZeniMax got the Elder Scrolls name, tossed to another company, dedicated to MMOs or something, and is making it...

I don\'t see reason to blame Bethesda, neither to think anything enjoyable will come out of this.

Already found out it was Zenimax. But still.

'Salvation can not come from one cloned MMO alone...but from many'

My current opinions:

1. TES Online will be a terrible WoW ripoff.

2. Skyrim, I have realized, was almost a hype machine, so incredibly simplified from morrowind and even oblivion I can no longer take it seriously.

3. Oblivion, while a heavily flawed and ugly game, is still fun to play.

4. Morrowind & Daggerfall are the greatest of the series, despite the vast amounts of cut content from each.
I was looking forward to this, but then I found out it won\'t be in first person, which really kills the Elder Scrolls experience for me.
